column1: mary frances daniels| mary frances daniels
column3: arkansas left this life to walk on streets of gold on june 13
column4: 2015 in harrison. the daughter of louis and tabitha (emerson) lingerfelt was born on january 22
column6: arkansas. she was the wonderful mother of 13 children and 68 grandchildren
column7: great-grandchildren and great-great-grandchildren. she brought laughter into a room and loved making people smile. she was preceded in death by her parents
column12: 1 great-great-grandchild and 2 husbands. she is survived by 3 sons
column14: carl daniels and gary bray; 6 daughters
column19: linda daniels and rose cates; 2 nephews
column21: 65 grandchildren and great-grandchildren and 3 great-great-grandchildren. graveside services will be held tuesday
column23: 2015 at 10:00 am at buffalo cemetery in parthenon with jerry bryant officiating. visitation will be monday from 6:00 to 8:00 at coffman funeral home chapel in harrison. pallbearers include tommy keys
column27: richard groves and brandon clayborn. online condolences may be left at www. coffmanfh. com.
